segments.text: I see the boy on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar, and I can’t help but smile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so determined, like nothing will stop him from getting those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbly, but he doesn’t seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel his excitement, like he’s on a secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, waiting for her share, and it’s kind of cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before, sneaking cookies when no one’s looking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like a little adventure for them, and I can’t help but find it charming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware of their antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a little nostalgic, remembering my own childhood mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, but the kids are too focused on their prize to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don’t get caught, but I also hope they don’t get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
